doc.title: President McKinley and His Cabinet on the Reviewing Stand, at Fairmount Park, Phila., May 27, 1899
doc.plot: The Chief Magistrate of the Nation is here shown reviewing the soldiers, and also the boys from the Cruiser Raleigh, who returned from Manila. The film is a beautiful lively subject, full of detail and one that will interest every one who admires the great War President.
